Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: [1][2][3] The concept of a bulk heterojunction ( BHJ ) utilizing mixtures of a conjugated polymer and a fullerene derivative is regarded as an efficient system for photovoltaic application.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| conjugated polymer |
| fullerene derivative |

The two material names identified in the paragraph are "conjugated polymer" and "fullerene derivative".

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| conjugated polymer |
| fullerene derivative |

The two material names identified in the paragraph are "conjugated polymer" and "fullerene derivative". The term "BHJ" is an abbreviation for "bulk heterojunction," which is a concept or system, not a material. Therefore, it is not included in the table.
